title: Karol & Eddie
description: With much excitement and joy we would like to invite you to join us on this very special day that will mark the beginning of our life as a family. After a few years, a first date in a hot dog stand, several trips to see each other and many calls with time difference, we have decided to start a life together. We want to celebrate this special day with the people that mean the most to us and share with you the day that will definitely be remembered for the rest of our lives.

gifts.title: Gifts
gifts.message: For us the most important thing is to share this special moment with you, but if you want to give us a gift we would appreciate it in cash as transporting gifts will be hard for us due to the travel logistics. At the entrance of the venue, we will have a box where you can drop the envelope that will be send to you with the invitation. Wholeheartedly we appreciate you.
